CustomField.formula: DATE( YEAR(ADDMONTHS(DX_CRN_Date__c , DX_Service_Order__r.Term_Months__c)), MONTH(ADDMONTHS(DX_CRN_Date__c , DX_Service_Order__r.Term_Months__c)), CASE(MONTH(ADDMONTHS(DX_CRN_Date__c, DX_Service_Order__r.Term_Months__c)), 1, 31, 2, 29, 3, 31, 4, 30, 5, 31, 6, 30, 7, 31, 8, 31, 9, 30, 10,31, 11,30, 12,31, 28 ))
CustomField.label: Initial Term Expiration
